tool_description: An API that gets positive news (happy news) stories from popular news sites using sentiment analysis
name: Happy News
title: Happy News

api_list.name: Get daily happy news from BBC
api_list.description: Gets daily happy news from the bbc news website. Returns the title, link and sentiment score.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://happy-news.p.rapidapi.com/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "happy-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
